Paṭhamajjhānaṁ dutiyajjhānaṁ tatiyajjhānaṁ samāpannānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cittasaṅkhāro ca nirujjhissati kāyasaṅkhāro ca nirujjhittha.
ya6.2.2:170.1: » Yassa yattha vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhittha tassa tattha cittasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatīti?
ya6.2.2:171.1: Savitakkasavicārabhūmiyaṁ pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha cittasaṅkhāro nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ savitakkasavicārabhūmiyaṁ tesaṁ tattha vacīsaṅkhāro ca nirujjhittha cittasaṅkhāro ca nirujjhissati.
